info.description: API for VPN management system supporting SSH, VMESS, VLESS, Trojan, and Shadowsocks protocols
info.title: VPN API

post.description: Authenticate admin user and get JWT token
Create a new admin user account

400.description: Invalid request or user already exists

post.description: Add a new domain to the system for VPN services

get.description: Get the currently configured domain and server IP

post.description: Renew the SSL certificate for the current domain

get.description: Get daily and monthly bandwidth usage
Get detailed system information including CPU, RAM, disk usage, and network info
Get the status of all managed VPN services

put.description: Enable or disable a user account

post.description: Create a new Shadowsocks VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all Shadowsocks VPN users

put.description: Extend the expiration date of a Shadowsocks VPN user

post.description: Create a new SSH/WebSocket VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all SSH/WebSocket VPN users

put.description: Extend the expiration date of an SSH/WebSocket VPN user

post.description: Create a new Trojan VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all Trojan VPN users

put.description: Extend the expiration date of a Trojan VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all users for all VPN protocols

post.description: Remove all expired VPN users from the system

get.description: Get traffic usage for a specific user

post.description: Create a new VLESS VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all VLESS VPN users

put.description: Extend the expiration date of a VLESS VPN user

post.description: Create a new VMESS VPN user

get.description: Get a list of all VMESS VPN users

put.description: Extend the expiration date of a VMESS VPN user

protocol.description: Set by handler, not required in request

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
